item.title: [JDK-8321894] Bump update version for OpenJDK: 21.0.3
item.description:
Development of update 21.0.3 starts in repository jdk21u-dev once it gets created in order to collect fixes for 21.0.3. The first change should be to bump the version.

Release of 21.0.3 is planned for Tuesday April 16th, 2024.

For the date, see also https://wiki.openjdk.org/display/JDKUpdates/JDK%2021u or https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/
item.summary: Bump update version for OpenJDK: 21.0.3
